name: My Own Jigsaw
description:
This is your own jigsaw game!

Why playing puzzle games using pictures that are irrelevant to our personal lives? Use your own picture to create a jigsaw and play! Isn't that more fun?

Locate a photo that you really enjoy looking all the time! You can either choose a picture from the existing photo albumen, or take a new one with the phone camera.

The image you have chosen will be shuffled into 16 pieces and you need to put them back together!

Need some help? Tap the light bulb icon for some hints;-)
